messages.subject: what to say?/kids want school
messages.msgSnippet: Oops, the subject line on my last post should have been What to Say?, not What to Day? Although that is an interesting play on words considering unschooling,
messages.messageBody:
Oops, the subject line on my last post should have been What to Say?, not
What to Day?
Although that is an interesting play on words considering unschooling,
because what WILL we do today? The weather is great, maybe play in the sprinklers
and water the garden!
Too bad for the kids still in public school here (NYS) until the end of the
month- it's going to be 90 today and they'll be in non-air conditioned
classrooms hoping for escape!
Amanda


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
